availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sena Logan in Edmonson County on December 9, 1855. Father of Anthony Vincent, Olive Vincent, and Gillis F. Vincent. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 21.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Precinct 2, p. 395A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #001904235, p. 155.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Edmonson County, KY, July 1863, p. 26. (Accessed via ancestry.com).
